title: Authors and Citation
text: Curtis (2023). gvsu215: Pretty Output Select 'mosaic' 'ggformula' Functions. https://github.com/ian-curtis/gvsu215, https://ian-curtis.github.io/gvsu215/.

what: Pretty Output For Select mosaic and ggformula Functions
title: Pretty Output For Select mosaic and ggformula Functions
text: goal gvsu215 …

title: Pretty Output For Select mosaic and ggformula Functions
text: can install development version gvsu215 GitHub :

title: Pretty Output For Select mosaic and ggformula Functions
text: basic example shows solve common problem: special using README.Rmd instead just README.md? can include R chunks like : ’ll still need render README.Rmd regularly, keep README.md --date. devtools::build_readme() handy . can also embed plots, example: case, don’t forget commit push resulting figure files, display GitHub CRAN.
code: library(gvsu215) ## basic example code summary(cars) #>      speed           dist        #>  Min.   : 4.0   Min.   :  2.00   #>  1st Qu.:12.0   1st Qu.: 26.00   #>  Median :15.0   Median : 36.00   #>  Mean   :15.4   Mean   : 42.98   #>  3rd Qu.:19.0   3rd Qu.: 56.00   #>  Max.   :25.0   Max.   :120.00

what: Add default theme options to plots — finalize_plot
title: Add default theme options to plots — finalize_plot
text: finalize_plot() used internally complete plot creation process. function uses ggformula create ggplot object adds theme choices size specifications.

title: Add default theme options to plots — finalize_plot
Add default theme options to plots — finalize_plot
text: plot plot (piped ggformula::gf_theme)

title: Add default theme options to plots — finalize_plot
text: ggplot object..

what: Add default theme options to tables — finalize_tbl
title: Add default theme options to tables — finalize_tbl
text: finalize_tbl() used internally complete table creation process. function creates flextable object adds theme choices size specifications.

title: Add default theme options to tables — finalize_tbl
code: finalize_tbl(table, digits, striped = TRUE, caption = NULL, na_str = "NA")

title: Add default theme options to tables — finalize_tbl
text: table dataframe (coerced flextable object) digits number digits round double columns striped table striped alternating colors (white/grey)? Defaults TRUE. caption table caption. Defaults NULL (caption). na_str string appear NA appears? Defaults "NA".

title: Add default theme options to tables — finalize_tbl
text: object class flextable.

title: Add default theme options to tables — finalize_tbl

what: gvsu215: Pretty Output For Select 'mosaic' and 'ggformula' Functions — gvsu215-package
title: gvsu215: Pretty Output For Select 'mosaic' and 'ggformula' Functions — gvsu215-package
text: light wrapper 'mosaic' 'ggformula' enabling nice graphics one line code. Designed Grand Valley State University's Introductory Statistics course (STA 215).

title: gvsu215: Pretty Output For Select 'mosaic' and 'ggformula' Functions — gvsu215-package
text: Maintainer: Ian Curtis curtisi@mail.gvsu.edu [copyright holder]

what: Create a one way data table — one_way
title: Create a one way data table — one_way
text: one_way() creates table giving counts percentages one variable.

title: Create a one way data table — one_way
Create a one way data table — one_way
text: data data frame. formula variable tabulate. given formula notation, ~var. digits number digits round . Defaults 3. caption optional caption table. Defaults NULL, sensible default provided within function.

title: Create a one way data table — one_way
text: object class flextable. interactive session, table viewable immediately.

title: Create a one way data table — one_way
text: One Way Counts Variable gear gear Count Percent 3 15 46.875 4 12 37.500 5 5 15.625 Total 32 100.000 One Way Counts Variable gear gear Count Percent 3 15 46.88 4 12 37.50 5 5 15.62 Total 32 100.00

title: Create a two way data table — two_way
code: two_way(data, formula, row_pct = FALSE, digits = 3, caption = NULL)

title: Create a two way data table — two_way
text: data data frame. formula variables tabulate. given formula notation var1~var2. Changing order variables swap table axes. row_pct row percents included cell? Defaults FALSE possible value TRUE. digits number digits round . Defaults 3. caption optional caption table. Defaults NULL, sensible default provided within function.

text: object class flextable. interactive session, table viewable immediately.
